details.name: Description
details.detail: Water quality results from laboratory analysis of water samples from Cheney reservoir.

details.name: Description
details.detail: Isolate columns of data for the water properties to be compared. Save as CSV UTF-8.

details.name: Name
details.detail: City of Wichita Water Quality Model

details.name: Description
details.detail: Uses current and historical water quality data to find the probability of toxins or taste-odor compounds released by harmful cyanobacteria blooms in reservoirs. This way the city can estimate a smaller time frame to operate their costly water treatment equipment.

details.name: Duration
details.detail: 1 day - model is updated with current data every 24 hours

details.name: Description
details.detail: Download historical data from server. Save as CSV UTF 8.

details.name: Description
details.detail: Isolate columns of data for the water properties to be compared. Save as CSV UTF-8.

details.name: Description
details.detail: Convert model results CSV file to JSON array. This is done by copying the data to be displayed into a field that concatenates the data and dates into a JSON array

details.name: Duration
details.detail: 2 weeks figuring out how to get formatting in a way that the visualization API can read it

details.name: Description
details.detail: Query USGS database for real time data from sensors installed in the reservoir. Other relevant parameters attributed to cyanobacteria blooms are queried from CHORDS and I-Microbe

details.name: Duration
details.detail: 3 months to get code working to do this

details.name: Description
details.detail: Run JavaScript code to draw charts that display 4 different variables of time series data with a synchronized cursor to facilitate trends

details.name: Description
details.detail: Upload data to file management system to store JSON, JavaScript and HTML files for internet access. All content being visualized goes here.

details.name: Duration
details.detail: 1 month to find this solution and get it set up

details.name: Description
details.detail: Multivariate visualization tool for comparison of 4 time series datasets. Synchronized cursor facilitates visual trend analysis

details.name: Tools used
details.detail: Highcharts, Highmaps, cPanel, Atom, Search engine

title: Understanding Cyanobacteria Harmful Algal Blooms in Cheney Reservoir
